A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Cool visuals\, poor story.
Glaring plot holes and a crappy side plot with finn and rose pretty much killed the movie.
Snoke was worthless.
First Order could have just  used Hyperdrive to go out to the side and then to infront of the rebels thus ending the very dumb 18 hour or so chase in minutes\, movie over\, everyone is dead. Rian destroyed what J.J. started with TFA. This whole oooo anyone can be Jedi thing\, WE ALREADY FREAKING KNEW THAT\, has anyone ever seen the jedi from the prequals? They came from all over. You're only getting the 1 star because of the visuals\, the story was worthless.
